original_text: It may be difficult for the judges in your towns to decide what is true. This may happen when one person has attacked or killed another person. It may happen when people cannot agree about some land. It may be anything that people in your towns are arguing about. If you do not know who is right, you must take those people to the place that the Lord your God will choose.
korean_text: 네 성중에서 서로 피를 흘렸거나 다투었거나 구타하였거나 서로 간에 고소하여 네가 판결하기 어려운 일이 생기거든 너는 일어나 네 하나님 여호와께서 택하실 곳으로 올라가서

sentences.original_text: It may be difficult for the judges in your towns
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 동네에 있는 판사들에게는 어려울 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: This may happen when one person has attacked or killed another person
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 한 사람이 다른 사람을 공격하거나 죽였을 때 일어날 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: It may happen when people cannot agree about some land
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 어떤 땅에 대해 동의하지 못할 때 일어날 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: It may be anything that people in your towns are arguing about
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 당신의 동네 사람들이 다투고 있는 어떤 것이든 될 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: If you do not know who is right
you must take those people to the place
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그 사람들을 그 장소로 데려가야 합니다

sentences.original_text: that the Lord your God will choose
